definition: to dredge/to clear away obstruction/thin/sparse/scanty/distant (relation)/not close/to neglect/negligent/to present a memorial to the Emperor/commentary/annotation
to dredge/to open up a path for/to remove obstructions/to clear the way/to enlighten/persuasion
to unblock/to dredge/to clear the way/to get things flowing/to facilitate/to mediate/to lobby/to explicate (a text)
to drift apart/to become estranged/to alienate/estrangement
to fail to pay sufficient attention to/to be negligent in regard to/to be lacking in
to slip/to overlook by negligence/careless omission/oversight

sentences.english: The surface hydrophobicity of coal increases by adsorbing nitrifying bacteria and quinoline in surface.
sentences.chinese: 通过吸附硝化细菌和喹啉在表面增加煤的表面疏水性。

sentences.english: Scattered piled foundation is a new exploration of pile foundation design theory.
sentences.chinese: 疏桩基础是近年来开始的对桩基设计理论的新探索。

sentences.english: I saw you smooching thon girl just outside my window.
sentences.chinese: 我看到你在我的窗外疏那个女孩喔。

sentences.english: And they took their journey from Succoth， and encamped in Etham， in the edge of the wilderness.
sentences.chinese: 他们从疏割起行，在旷野边的以倘安营。

sentences.english: Parents give their children lucky money in red envelopes.
sentences.chinese: 后代疏给他们的小孩儿搭著黑包的压岁钱。

sentences.english: Then the scientists made the glass beads hydrophobic.
sentences.chinese: 然后，科学家们把玻璃珠变成疏水性的。

sentences.english: Hydrophobic cluster analysis showed that the peptide was likely to form an epitope.
sentences.chinese: 疏水性分析证明其可能构成一个表位。

sentences.english: The effect on surface hydrophobicity and emulsifying properties was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 测定了改性对大豆蛋白表面疏水性和乳化性的影响。

sentences.english: Thinning of basal flowers didn't affect significantly the quantity of seed.
sentences.chinese: 基部疏除蕾不会显著影响种子产量。

sentences.english: Practice shows that this is a good drainage method.
sentences.chinese: 实践表明这是一种较好的疏干方式。

sentences.english: In the paper, the membrane distillation process and hydrophobic microporous membranes were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 文章对膜蒸馏过程及疏水性微孔膜做了介绍。

sentences.english: It is infeasible to directly deposit copper coating on carbon fiber of hydrophobic nature and inertia.
sentences.chinese: 碳纤维具有疏水性和表面惰性，很难直接镀铜。
伯氏疏螺旋体引起莱姆病。

sentences.english: Fourier transform infrared spectra demonstrated that the aggregate substance on aluminum foils was aluminum myristate.
sentences.chinese: 经红外光谱分析可知，铝表面形成了疏水性十四酸铝。

sentences.english: Stem and young branches sparsely pilose-strigose, densely strigose on nodes.
sentences.chinese: 茎和具糙伏毛幼枝疏生柔毛，在节上的密被糙伏毛。

sentences.english: The energy-saving effect is notable after the reformation realized.
sentences.chinese: 改造后的低压加热器疏水泵节能效果良好。

definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state
different/unique/special/very/(classical) to behead/to die/to cut off/to separate/to surpass
classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
to judge (i.e. to hear and pass judgment in a law court)/to hear and decide
(literary) to shut or bolt a door/door
to stay for a long period
